A

Alert - Interface in evs4j
A marker interface for informational events of interest to some applications, see for example the MonitorConnection which tracks certain metrics for the Totem Single-Ring Protocol.

Configuration - Interface in evs4j
Interface for a processor 'configuration', also known in virtual synchrony circles as a 'view' or a 'group'.
conn - Variable in class evs4j.ConnectionDecorator
 
Connection - Interface in evs4j
Connection objects are used to join/rejoin a group, to send messages, and to register a Listener object, which can receive messages.
ConnectionDecorator - Class in evs4j
Useful for implementing chains of connections.
ConnectionDecorator(Connection) - Constructor for class evs4j.ConnectionDecorator
Constructs a ConnectionDecorator around an underlying Connection.
createMessage(boolean) - Method in interface evs4j.Connection
Returns a Message object to be used for sending.

Calls createMessage(boolean) on the underlying connection.

Listener - Interface in evs4j
A Listener object performs processing of all incoming events, including new configurations, message delivery, and alerts.

M

Message - Interface in evs4j
Interface for totally-ordered messages.

Processor - Class in evs4j
